item.title: Shita add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Shita add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, nor to worry about the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly." -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Shita add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?" -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Shita add a quote by Gautama Buddha
item.description: "All that we are is the result of what we have thought: it is founded on our thoughts and made up of our thoughts. If a man speak or act with an evil thought, suffering follows him as the wheel follows the hoof of the beast that draws the wagon.... If a man speak or act with a good thought, happiness follows him like a shadow that never leaves him." -- Gautama Buddha

item.title: Shita add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills." -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Where there is love there is life." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Seven Deadly Sins
Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Nobody can hurt me without my permission." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Truth is one, paths are many." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Silence becomes cowardice when occasion demands speaking out the whole truth and acting accordingly." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "You don't know who is important to you until you actually lose them." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Nonviolence is a weapon of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent than the one derived from fear of punishment." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "When another person makes you suffer, it is because he suffers deeply within himself, and his suffering is spilling over. He does not need punishment; he needs help. That's the message he is sending." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "To be beautiful means to be yourself. You donâ€™t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "My actions are my only true belongings." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by thich nhat hanh
item.description: "Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor." -- thich nhat hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Our own life has to be our message." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "If you suffer and make your loved ones suffer, there is nothing that can justify your desire." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Understanding means throwing away your knowledge." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "In true love, you attain freedom." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Shita add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "I can choose either to be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It's all a question of how I view my life." -- Paulo Coelho
